Detailed Description

<<interface>> The class used to register the RTI Data Distribution Service pluggable discovery plugins for participant and endpoint discovery.

Member Function Documentation

static DDS_ReturnCode_t NDDSDiscoverySupport::register_participant_plugin (  DDSDomainParticipant *  disabled_participant,
struct NDDS_Discovery_ParticipantPlugin &  discovery_plugin
)  [static]
 

The API used to register a participant discovery plugin with a DDSDomainParticipant.

Parameters:
disabled_participant <<in>> A valid non-NULL DDSDomainParticipant that has not been enabled.
discovery_plugin <<in>> The plugin to be registered.
Returns:
One of the Standard Return Codes, or DDS_RETCODE_PRECONDITION_NOT_MET.

static DDS_ReturnCode_t NDDSDiscoverySupport::register_endpoint_plugin (  DDSDomainParticipant *  disabled_participant,
struct NDDS_Discovery_EndpointPlugin &  discovery_plugin
)  [static]
 

The API used to register a endpoint discovery plugin with a DDSDomainParticipant.

Parameters:
disabled_participant <<in>> A valid non-NULL DDSDomainParticipant that has not been enabled.
discovery_plugin <<in>> The plugin to be registered.
Returns:
One of the Standard Return Codes, or DDS_RETCODE_PRECONDITION_NOT_MET.
